short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to see reviews for courses and instructors while selecting your classes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension connects to the ASPC website from Pomona College and allows users to quickly and easily view professor and course ratings. Users can search using the same field and buttons in the top right allow users to easily see the results they want.
